text: VTC may refer to: ==Academia== * Vehicular Technology Conference * Vermont Technical College, US * Virginia Tech Carilion School of Medicine and Research Institute, US * Vocational Training Council, Hong Kong ==Other== * Vacaville Transportation Center * Vertcoin * Vesicular-tubular cluster * Veterans Transition Center, California, US * Video teleconferencing, see videotelephony * Vietnam Television Corporation * Virginia Transformer Corporation * Volunteer Training Corps (1914–1918), UK * Virtual Trucking Company
title: VTC
